languages.text: "Хм... Щедро, Ваша Светлость. Очень щедро. Если мы не сдохнем, "Амасекус" утонет в тронах. Что же, по рукам, но с условием — пишите бумагу, что ваши наследники не имеют права отозвать обещание. Потому что, сами понимаете, если дело не выгорит, наследник у вас появится очень скоро".

traits.locale_text: "Предлагаете рискнуть? Что же, вы фигура влиятельная, может быть с вашей помощью и правда что-нибудь да выйдет. Сама я боец не ахти, но кое-чем подсобить все же могу..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Hmm... It is generous, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Very generous. If we don't all get killed, the Amasecus will be flooded with thrones. All right then, it's a deal, but I have one condition. Write me a document saying your heirs have no right to go back on the promise. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work, there'll be a new Rogue Trader von Valancius in the very near future."
languages.original_text: "Хм... Щедро, Ваша Светлость. Очень щедро. Если мы не сдохнем, "Амасекус" утонет в тронах. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work you're going to have an heir very soon."

languages.text: “嗯……确实很慷慨，大人，非常慷慨。只要我们能活下来的话，烈酒修会用不了多久就会赚得盆满钵满了。好吧，行，一言为定，但我有个条件。你得给我写份书面文件，强调就算是你的继承人也无权收回承诺。因为你也知道，如果这场起义失败的话，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝恐怕很快就会有新的继承人了。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm... It is generous, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Very generous. If we don't all get killed, the Amasecus will be flooded with thrones. All right then, it's a deal, but I have one condition. Write me a document saying your heirs have no right to go back on the promise. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work, there'll be a new Rogue Trader von Valancius in the very near future."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……听起来很慷慨，大人，非常慷慨。只要我们能活下来的话，烈酒修会用不了多久就会赚得盆满钵满了。好吧，行，一言为定，但我有个条件。你得给我写份书面文件，强调就算是你的继承人也无权收回承诺。因为你也知道，如果这场起义失败的话，你恐怕很快就会有继承人了。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「うーん…陛下、寛大なお言葉ですね。とても寛大です。私達が皆殺しにされなければ、アマセッカスは王座で溢れかえるでしょうね。わかりました。取引成立です。ただし、一つだけ条件があります。あなたの後継者には約束を撤回する権利がないと一筆書いてください。もしこの計画が失敗すれば、新たな自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが間もなく登場するはずですからね」
languages.original_text: "Hmm... It is generous, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Very generous. If we don't all get killed, the Amasecus will be flooded with thrones. All right then, it's a deal, but I have one condition. Write me a document saying your heirs have no right to go back on the promise. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work, there'll be a new Rogue Trader von Valancius in the very near future."

traits.locale_text: 「うーん…陛下、寛大なお言葉ですね。とても寛大です。私達が皆殺しにされなければ、アマセッカスは王座で溢れかえるでしょうね。わかりました。取引成立です。ただし、一つだけ条件があります。あなたの後継者には約束を撤回する権利がないと一筆書いてください。もしこの計画が失敗すれば、新たな自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが間もなく登場するはずですからね」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Mmm... Es generoso, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Muy generoso por su parte. Si no nos matan, el Amasecus se llenará de tronos. Muy bien, es un trato, pero con una condición. Escriba un documento diciendo que sus herederos no tienen derecho a retractarse, porque, como comprenderá, si esto no funciona, no tardará en haber un nuevo Comerciante Independiente von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "Hmm... It is generous, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Very generous. If we don't all get killed, the Amasecus will be flooded with thrones. All right then, it's a deal, but I have one condition. Write me a document saying your heirs have no right to go back on the promise. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work, there'll be a new Rogue Trader von Valancius in the very near future."

traits.locale_text: «Hmm... Qué generoso, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Muy generoso por su parte. Si no nos matan, el Amasecus se llenará de tronos. Muy bien, es un trato, pero con una condición. Escriba un documento diciendo que sus herederos no tienen derecho a retractarse, porque, como comprenderá, si esto no funciona, pronto alguien ocupará su lugar».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Hmm ... Großzügig, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Äußerst großzügig. Wenn wir nicht alle getötet werden, wird das Amasecus in Thronmünzen ertrinken. Also gut, abgemacht, aber unter einer Bedingung. Schreibt mir ein Dokument, in dem steht, dass Eure Erben nicht das Recht haben, das Versprechen zurückzunehmen. Euch ist ja sicherlich klar, wenn der Plan nicht funktioniert, dann gibt es schon sehr bald einen neuen Freihändler von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... It is generous, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Very generous. If we don't all get killed, the Amasecus will be flooded with thrones. All right then, it's a deal, but I have one condition. Write me a document saying your heirs have no right to go back on the promise. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work, there'll be a new Rogue Trader von Valancius in the very near future."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm ... Großzügig, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Äußerst großzügig. Wenn wir nicht alle getötet werden, wird das Amasecus in Thronmünzen ertrinken. Also gut, abgemacht, aber unter einer Bedingung. Schreibt mir ein Dokument, in dem steht, dass Eure Erben nicht das Recht haben, das Versprechen zurückzunehmen. Euch ist ja sicherlich klar, wenn der Plan nicht funktioniert, dann habt Ihr schon sehr bald einen Erben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Hmm... En effet, Votre Seigneurie, c'est très généreux de votre part. Si on ne se fait pas tous tuer, la cote de l'Amasecus va grimper en flèche... Très bien, je marche, mais à une condition : écrivez-moi un document disant que vos successeurs n'auront pas le droit de revenir sur votre parole. Parce que, comme vous pouvez le comprendre, si votre plan échoue, quelqu'un prendra votre place très rapidement. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm... It is generous, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Very generous. If we don't all get killed, the Amasecus will be flooded with thrones. All right then, it's a deal, but I have one condition. Write me a document saying your heirs have no right to go back on the promise. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work, there'll be a new Rogue Trader von Valancius in the very near future."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... En effet, Votre Seigneurie, c'est très généreux de votre part. Si on ne se fait pas tous tuer, la cote de l'Amasecus va grimper en flèche... Très bien, je marche, mais à une condition : écrivez-moi un document disant que vos successeurs n'auront pas le droit de revenir sur votre parole. Parce que si votre plan échoue, quelqu'un prendra votre place très bientôt. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Hımm... Kâfi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hayli kâfi. Ölüp gitmezsek Amasekus'un darphaneden farkı kalmaz. Pekâlâ, anlaştık. Ama tek şartım var. Vârislerinizin bu sözünüzden dönme hakkı olmadığına dair bir belge imzalamanızı istiyorum. Görüyorsunuz ki plan suya düşerse Hür Tacir von Valancius, pek yakında değişecektir."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... It is generous, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Very generous. If we don't all get killed, the Amasecus will be flooded with thrones. All right then, it's a deal, but I have one condition. Write me a document saying your heirs have no right to go back on the promise. Because, as you can understand, if this doesn't work, there'll be a new Rogue Trader von Valancius in the very near future."
